title: The Waiting Room
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Lacto, International, Western, Beer/Wine, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. Cafe and shops set up in a former bus station. Offers a four course vegan menu for Â£10 (price as of March 2014). On premises is also a hack/maker/library space with a gallery shop and social history project. Please check events page for a wide selection of activities including live music and events.
